steps.instruction: Start with a big round head - this will be our cat's face!
Add two pointy ears on top - cats have triangular ears!
Make the ears extra cute with pink inner ears!
Draw two big round eyes - cats have beautiful eyes!
Add tiny black pupils in the center of each eye.
Draw a small triangle nose - perfect for a kitty!
Add a sweet little smile under the nose.
Give our cat whiskers - three on each side for balance!
Add small cheek spots to make our cat extra adorable!
Start with a friendly round head for our puppy!
Add two adorable floppy ears - dogs love to listen!
Draw two bright, happy eyes!
Add sparkly pupils to make the eyes come alive!
Create a cute snout - dogs have longer noses than cats!
Add a wet little nose at the tip of the snout!
Draw a happy panting mouth with a little tongue!
Add cute eyebrow spots - many dogs have these markings!
Start with an elegant oval head - horses have long faces!
Add two alert pointy ears on top!
Add inner ears to make them look more realistic!
Draw two large, gentle eyes - horses have beautiful eyes!
Add pupils to bring the eyes to life!
Create the horse's distinctive long snout!
Add two nostrils - horses need big nostrils to breathe!
Draw a gentle mouth line below the nostrils.
Add a beautiful flowing mane across the forehead!
Add a small star marking on the forehead - many horses have this!
Start with a big round head - pandas have chubby faces!
Add two perfectly round ears on top!
Create the famous panda eye patches - these make pandas special!
Add bright little eyes inside the patches!
Draw a small triangle nose - pandas have cute button noses!
Add a gentle oval muzzle area around the nose!
Draw a sweet little smile - pandas always look happy!
Add tiny cheek spots to make our panda extra adorable!
Give our panda some bamboo whisker spots!
Start with a big round head - bears have chubby faces!
Add two small round ears on top!
Draw two friendly eyes!
Add a round black nose!
Draw a gentle smile under the nose!
Start with a round pink head!
Add two pointy ears on top!
Draw two small eyes!
Add a cute snout - pigs have special noses!
Draw two nostrils on the snout!
Add a happy little smile!
Start with a round green head!
Add two big bulging eyes on top!
Draw pupils in the big eyes!
Add two tiny nostrils!
Draw a wide smile - frogs are happy!
Start with a round head - owls have big heads!
Add two ear tufts on top!
Draw two huge round eyes - owls have amazing eyes!
Add pupils in the center of each eye!
Draw a hooked beak - owls are hunters!
Start with a round head!
Add two big round ears!
Draw inner ears!
Add two bright eyes!
Draw a cute snout area!
Add a small nose and smile!
Start with a fluffy round head!
Add fluffy wool bumps around the head!
Draw two small ears!
Add two dot eyes!
Draw a small black nose!
Add a gentle smile!
Start with a round head!
Add two long ears - rabbits have special ears!
Add pink inner ears!
Draw two bright eyes!
Add a triangle nose - rabbits have cute noses!
Draw a sweet smile!
Add whiskers on both sides!
Start with a small round head!
Add two big round ears!
Draw inner ears!
Add two bright little eyes!
Draw a tiny pink nose!
Add whiskers - mice have long whiskers!
Start with a big oval head!
Add two large fan ears!
Draw two small eyes!
Add a long curved trunk - elephants use trunks to grab things!
Draw the other side of the trunk to make it thick!
Add trunk tip and nostrils!
Start with a round head!
Add a magnificent mane around the head!
Draw two brave eyes!
Add a triangle nose - lions are big cats!
Draw a proud mouth!
Add whiskers - even lion kings have whiskers!
Start with a round head like a big cat!
Add two round ears on top!
Draw tiger stripes on the forehead!
Add two fierce but friendly eyes!
Draw a triangle nose!
Add a mouth and more stripes on the cheeks!
Start with a triangle-shaped head - foxes have pointy faces!
Add two pointy ears on top!
Draw two bright eyes!
Add a small black nose at the tip!
Draw a sly little smile!
Add white chest markings - foxes have white chests!
Start with a big oval head!
Add two small ears on the sides!
Draw two gentle eyes!
Add a big rectangular snout - cows have big noses!
Draw two big nostrils!
Add cow spots on the face!
Add small horns on top!
Start with a round head!
Add an oval body below the head!
Draw a bright orange beak!
Add one visible eye!
Draw a wing on the body!
Add webbed feet - ducks are great swimmers!
Start with a round head!
Add a plump oval body!
Draw a red comb on top of the head!
Add a bright eye and orange beak!
Draw a wing on the body!
Add chicken feet with claws!
Start with an oval body!
Add a triangle tail at the back!
Draw a big round eye!
Add a pupil in the eye!
Draw a small mouth!
Add fins on top and bottom!
Add scales pattern with small lines!
Start with a round head poking out!
Draw a big oval shell body!
Add two small eyes!
Draw shell pattern with hexagons!
Add four little feet sticking out!
Add a small tail!
Start with a round head!
Add a big oval body!
Draw two small eyes!
Add an orange triangle beak!
Draw white belly area!
Add two flippers on the sides!
Add orange webbed feet!
Start with a round head!
Add a long oval body!
Draw two big friendly eyes!
Add pupils in the eyes!
Draw a small nose!
Add whiskers - seals have long whiskers!
Add flippers and tail!
Start with a big oval body!
Add a triangle tail at the back!
Draw a small eye!
Add a mouth line!
Draw a blowhole on top for breathing!
Add water spout from the blowhole!
Add side fins!
